title: Master Devil Don’t Kiss Me - Novel Updates
tags: Abusive Characters   Adapted to Drama   Arrogant Characters   Bickering Couple   College/University   Female Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   S*xual Abuse   Wealthy Characters
author: Jin Xia Mo   锦夏末
description:
After losing her mother to cancer, An Chuxia finds herself “adopted” by the Han family. 

She ends up attending the prestigious Royal College of Stein where her housemate, the famous Master Devil, Han Qilu, makes her life hellish but helps her during difficult moments.>
